titleStmt.title: The Resurrection rescued from the souldiers calumnies, in two sermons preached at St. Maries in Oxon. / By Robert Jones D.D.
titleStmt.author: Lushington, Thomas, 1590-1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Richard Lownds at the White Lion in Pauls Church-yard, neer the little north-door,

notesStmt.note: Robert Jones = Thomas Lushington. Cf. Wing.
The sermons were originally preached in 1624.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Feb:"; The '9' in imprint date is altered to an "8".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the White Lion in Pauls Church-yard, neer the little north-door
